text: This is a list of streaming services by monthly active users (MAU): * YouTube (video) - 2 billion in May 2019 https://variety.com/2019/digital/news/youtube-2-billion-users-tv-screen-watch- time-hours-1203204267/ — 150 million DAU https://market.us/statistics/online- video-and-streaming-sites/youtube/https://dustinstout.com/social-media- statistics/ * Tencent Video - 900 million in March 2019 http://www.asiaone.com/business/tencent-video-achieved-6259-million-paid- subscriptions-maintaining-no1-position-in-china * TikTok (video) - 800 million in April 2020 https://www.printful.com/blog/tiktok-ads/ — 400 million DAU https://www.businessofapps.com/data/tik-tok-statistics/ * Tencent Music (music) - 700 million in November 2017 https://www.thestandard.com.hk/section- news/section/2/189155/Tencent-spikes-on-music-arm-move * iQiyi (video) - 500 million * Youku (video) - 500 million * Kuaishou (video sharing) - 400 million in July 2019 https://www.chinadaily.com.cn/a/201907/25/WS5d390ca0a310d83056400eab.html — 200 million DAU https://www.scmp.com/tech/apps-social/article/3044867/douyin- nearly-doubles-daily-active-users-over-past-year-chinese * Hotstar (video) - 300 million in March 2020 * Dailymotion (video) - 300 million in April 2017 https://variety.com/2017/digital/news/dailymotion-relaunch-vivendi-premium- content-1202027520/ * iHeartRadio (music) - 275 million listeners and 128 million registered users https://musically.com/2019/04/04/iheartmedia-files- for-ipo-and-reveals-figures-for-iheartradio/ * Spotify (music) - 271 million in February 2020 * Vine (video) - 200 million in November 2015 https://www.fool.com/investing/general/2015/11/08/what-can-vine-be-for- twitter-inc.aspx * Dailyhunt (news) - 190 million * Netflix (video) - 182 million subscribers * MX Player (video) - 290 million * SoundCloud (music) - 175 million in March 2019 * Vimeo (video) - 170 million https://stephenslighthouse.com/2016/06/25/the-top-social-media-channels-by- category/ * DouYu (video) - 163 million in 2019 * Gaana.com (music) - 150 million in March 2020 https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india- business/gaana-becomes-first-music-app-to-reach-150-million-active- users/articleshow/73908060.cms * Toutiao (news) - 120 million in September 2017 http://www.chinadaily.com.cn/bizchina/2017-09/06/content_31619329.htm * JioSaavn (music) - 190 million in April 2019 * Pandora Radio (music) - 76 million in 2014 * Prime Video (video) - 75 million subscribers in June 2019 https://marketrealist.com/2019/06/how-does-amazon-prime-compare-to-netflix/ * Apple Music - 60 million subscribers * Disney+ (video) - 50 million subscribers * Amazon Music (music) - 50 million subscribers * Twitch (video) - 43 million in October 2013 https://techcrunch.com/2020/02/20/twitch-to- top-40-million-u-s-viewers-next-year-forecast-says/ * Hulu (video) - 30 million subscribers * Anghami (music) - 21 million in March 2019 https://www.menabytes.com/anghami-21-million-mau/ * Deezer (music) - 14 million monthly active users * Mixer (video) - 10 million in January 2018 https://www.windowscentral.com/mixer-hits-10-million-monthly-active-users-new- partner-opportunities-way == See also == * List of social platforms by monthly active users ==References== Category:Streaming Category:Internet-related lists
title: List of content platforms by monthly active users
